workflow.name: Analyze Customer Reviews from 5 Platforms with Thordata Scraping & GPT-4.1 Reports
workflow.description:
Automatically gather hundreds of real customer reviews from five major platforms in one run using [Thordata](https://www.thordata.com/?ls=n8n&lk=reviewmonitor) API and Proxy ‚Äî Trustpilot, Capterra, Chrome Web Store, TrustRadius, and Product Hunt ‚Äî then let GPT-4.1 perform deep collective sentiment analysis, uncover common praises & complaints, flag critical issues, assess churn risk, and deliver actionable recommendations straight to your inbox as a stunning executive HTML report.

## Who‚Äôs it for
- Product managers & founders  
- Growth and marketing teams  
- Customer success & support leads  
- Agencies delivering competitor or product review reports

## How it works
1. Submit product URLs via form, webhook, or use defaults  
2. Smart, Cloudflare-safe scraping with automatic pagination  
3. Universal parser standardizes every review format  
4. Global deduplication using deterministic unique IDs  
5. GPT-4.1 analyzes all reviews collectively (not one-by-one)  
6. Beautiful responsive HTML email with sentiment badges, stats, and recommendations

## Requirements
- [Thordata](https://www.thordata.com/?ls=n8n&lk=reviewmonitor) API key (free tier works) ‚Üí set as HTTP Header Auth credential  
- OpenAI API key  
- Gmail account (or replace with any email node)

## How to set up
1. Add your Thordata and OpenAI credentials  
2. Connect Gmail  
3. Click ‚ÄúExecute Workflow‚Äù ‚Äì instantly tests with Thordata‚Äôs own reviews

## How to customize
- Edit default product in ‚ÄúPrepare Review Sources‚Äù node  
- Modify the AI prompt or email design anytime  
- Add more sources or change the output format easily

Zero browser automation ¬∑ Rate-limit safe ¬∑ Fully deduplicated ¬∑ Plug-and-play in minutes.

parameters.formDescription: Provide review source URLs for a product. Placeholders shown for convenience, replace with your product's details as needed.

parameters.content:
## üåü Scrape & AI-Analyze Reviews from 5 Platforms in One Click

Automatically collect hundreds of customer reviews from Trustpilot, Capterra, Chrome Web Store, TrustRadius, and Product Hunt ‚Üí deduplicate ‚Üí let GPT-4.1 analyze sentiment, praises, complaints, churn risk, and give actionable recommendations ‚Üí receive a beautiful executive email report.

### Who‚Äôs it for  
- Product managers & founders  
- Growth/marketing teams  
- Customer success & support leads  
- Agencies delivering review reports  

### How it works  
1. Submit product URLs (form, webhook or defaults)  
2. Smart pagination + Cloudflare-safe scraping  
3. Universal parser standardizes all reviews  
4. AI collective analysis (not review-by-review)  
5. Gorgeous HTML summary emailed automatically  

### Requirements  
- Thordata API key (free tier OK) ‚Üí HTTP Header Auth credential  
- OpenAI API key  
- Gmail (or swap for any email node)  

### How to set up  
1. Add your Thordata key ‚Üí create HTTP Header Auth credential  
2. Add OpenAI credential  
3. Connect Gmail  
4. Test instantly with defaults (Thordata reviews)  

### Customize easily  
- Change default product in ‚ÄúPrepare Review Sources‚Äù  
- Edit AI prompt for different analysis style  
- Tweak the email design in ‚ÄúRender Elegant Email Template‚Äù  

Plug-and-play ¬∑ No browser automation ¬∑ Fully deduplicated ¬∑ Rate-limit safe

### üîÑ STEP 1: Choose your input  
‚Ä¢ Manual Trigger ‚Üí quick test with defaults  
‚Ä¢ Form Trigger ‚Üí user-friendly UI  
‚Ä¢ Webhook ‚Üí integrate with Zapier/Make/etc.

### üõ†Ô∏è STEP 2: Build source list  
Accepts Trustpilot domain, full URLs for Capterra/Chrome/TrustRadius, and Product Hunt slug ‚Üí creates clean source objects.

### üîÑ STEP 3: Smart pagination loop (rate-limit safe)  
‚Ä¢ Handles all 5 sites differently  
‚Ä¢ Builds correct ?page= URLs  
‚Ä¢ Scrapes via Thordata (JS-rendered + proxy rotation)  
‚Ä¢ Stops when no more reviews on page  
‚Ä¢ 2-second polite delay between requests

### üßπ STEP 4: Global storage + deduplication  
Collects reviews from every source & page ‚Üí unique IDs prevent duplicates even if formatting changes.

### ü§ñ STEP 5: AI analysis & beautiful report  
‚Ä¢ All reviews sent together to GPT-4.1  
‚Ä¢ Structured insights + sentiment scoring  
‚Ä¢ Renders responsive HTML email  
‚Ä¢ Sends executive summary automatically

user.name: Naveen Choudhary
user.bio: I create AI-driven n8n workflows that turn repetitive tasks into smooth, hands-off automations. Want to explore an idea? Book a quick consult: https://cal.com/nickchoudhary/30min

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
